While ACI has a sound ESG approach, we recognize the need 
to further advance our efforts by developing a forward-looking 
strategy to proactively address constantly evolving ESG 
expectations and disclosure requirements. In 2021 , ACI made a significant commitment to developing and formalizing our strategic 
roadmap. We embarked on an ESG strategy development process 
to be completed in 2023, focusing on meeting and progressing 
toward our standards for environmental and social responsibility.
